item.description:
@xVince wrote:

i cant understand the npcdrops

its comes like this

public class NPCDrops {
public int DropType;
public int[] Items = new int[100];
public int[] ItemsN = new int[100];
public int npcId;1

public NPCDrops(int _2745) {
	npcId = _npcId;1
	for (int i = 0; i < Items.length; i++) {
		Items[i] = -1;
		ItemsN[i] = 0;
	}
}

}

i dont know where to put the items ids and the npc ids really confused me

i hope you reply me a good answer it may help me alot thanks
